channel.title: Command Help!
channel.description:
I need someone to tell me how to add in a certain command
::armor, the last time it didn't work and I gotten no reply..and please make it Dodian source usable.
I need a command where the player types ::armor and it gives him some random armor.
Thanks!

item.title: Command Help!
item.dc:creator: @Trent1 Trent!!
item.description:
@Trent1 wrote:

it looks way off for an add item code.

i’ll see if i can fix it up

EDIT:
what armour do you want it to give?

Read full topic

item.title: Command Help!
item.dc:creator: @sikeo sikeo
item.description:
@sikeo wrote:

Trent!!:

what code have you got at the moment for this command?[/quote][quote=“Trent!!, post:2, topic:327564”]what code have you got at the moment for this command?

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“armor”)) {
int[] armorID = {
id, id, id
};
for(int i : armorID) {
addItem(i, 1);
}
}

Read full topic
